summary: Johnson & Johnson (J&J) is a huge American company that makes medicines, medical tools, and biotech products. It was started in 1886 by three brothers and is now one of the biggest and most successful companies in the world. J&J is based in New Jersey and has around 130,000 employees. Recently, they split off their consumer health business to focus more on prescription drugs and medical devices. The company is very well-known and has a top credit rating.
title: Johnson & Johnson
